/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, adding a splash of vibrancy to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding texture to the expansive backdrop. The image is slightly blurred, giving it a sense of motion and dynamism.
